notificationOpenWindowError.message: Failed to open a new window. $ERROR$

notificationDataUriError.message: Can't search the image unsupported format(Data URI).

notificationDownloadLanguageError.message: Failed to download the language list.

htmlLinkageMessage1.message: Click "Wiktionary" or "Wikipedia" above, the selected text search result is displayed.

htmlLinkageMessage2.message: Turn on the upper left slide button, the selected text is automatically sent to the server to search, even if the text includes your privacy information like a password. I recommend that you disable when you don't need it or enable widget by allowed domains.

htmlMaxLengthLimitation.message: Don't search for the text larger than $ERROR$ bytes.

htmlParseFailed.message: Failed to parse the text. Displayed the original text.

htmlMeaningNotFound.message: Failed to execute Display Only Meaning function because there is not a description of the meaning. Displayed the original text.

htmlSectionNotFound.message: Failed to execute Language Filter function because there is not a matching language. Displayed without filtering.

htmlUnmatchText.message: Displayed the result of full text search.

htmlConnectionError.message: Failed to connect to the server. $ERROR$

htmlServerError.message: Got an error from the server. $ERROR$

htmlFormDescription.message: Click the "Add premade links" button to add ready-made links from a list of some popular websites. "$$1" in any URL is replaced with the selected text to search for.

htmlPresetDescription.message: Select some links and press the "Add" button. Then they're added.

htmlLabelDescription.message: Input a site name. It's displayed in the widget or context menu.

htmlUrlDescription.message: Input a URL. A "$$1" is replaced with the selected text.

alertHistoryAllDelete.message: All history items will be deleted. It contains history items which aren't displayed in the table below.

htmlHistoryDescription.message: This history data is saved into the PC. They are not in the scope of browser synchronization service. You can change the configurations to save history or not on the "Link edit" menu.

htmlHistoryZeroRowMessage.message: The number of the history items is 0.

htmlRankingDescription.message: By using history data, this function aggregates the number of searches for each selected text. If you delete some of the history items, the number of searches decreases too. The numbers will be good for studying.

htmlRankingZeroRowMessage.message: The number of the history items is 0.

htmlDisplayFunctionDescription.message: Select whether to display widget automatically or manually after selecting a text.

htmldomainListDescription.message: When a domain matches the list below, the  widget can be displayed. To enable, select the "Enable by allowed domains" check on the "Widget startup" menu.

htmlNoneDomainAllowedDescription.message: There are not any allowed domains.

notificationDomainLengthError.message: The domain lenght is limited to $LENGTH$ bytes or less.

notificationDomainListSizeError.message: The number of the domain list is limited to $SIZE$ items maximum.

htmlLinkListActionMouseover.message: Display widget by mousing over the icon.

htmlLinkListActionMouseclick.message: Display widget by clicking the icon.

htmlLinkListSeparatorTitle.message: Separator between link area and description area

htmlApiServiceDescription.message: Wiktionary is a sister site of Wikipedia. It's a dictionary run by volunteers. When using Wiktionary, the description of a word is displayed on the widget.

htmlServiceCodeDescription.message: The displayed language and the content of the description are different for each host. If you change it, Language Filter needs additional setting. If you select the "Disable" option, the description area is hidden.

htmlLanguageFilterDescription.message: Wiktionary is a multilingual dictionary. Its articles include some descriptions of various languages. Using Language Filter, only descriptions of the languages you specified are displayed.

htmlLanguageFilterAside.message: For example, "four" means "4 " in English, but in French it means "oven, furnace". If you select "English" for Language Filter, only "4" is displayed.

htmlLanguageFilterDownloadMessage.message: Now downloading a list of languages from Wiktionary

htmlApiCutOutDescription.message: Leave only content for the meaning of the word, exclude other content like pronunciation and etymology.

htmlWikipediaLinkageDescription.message: Wikipedia is an encyclopedia site where volunteers post articles. By using Wikipedia, the description of a word is displayed on the widget

htmlWikipediaHostDescription.message: The displayed language and the content of the description are different for each host.

htmlIssueDescription.message: Use for bug reports, suggestions, questions, etc. The posts will be open to the public.

htmlIam.message: Ryosuke Ohta (太田亮介), Freelance programmer, in Tokyo Japan.

htmlLicenseDescription.message: This software is released under the MIT License.

htmlCheckByteLengthError.message: Shorten to $MAX_LENGTH$ bytes or less (Currently $LENGTH$ bytes).

htmlCheckFieldLengthError.message: The number of links is limited to $MAX_FIELDS$ items maximum.

htmlCheckPresetLengthError.message: The number of links is limited to $MAX_FIELDS$ items maximum. It is set to $SUM$ items. Currently $CHECKED$ items are selected. You can select $REMAINING$ items.

htmlCheckLanguageFilterByteLengthError.message: The number of the character of Language Filter is limited to $LENGTH$ bytes or less.

htmlCheckLanguageFilterLengthError.message: The number of the language of Language Filter is limited to $MAX$ items maximum.
